price: 20. (Moisés) dijo: “Cometí aquel crimen cuando aún estaba extraviado.
arabic: قَالَ فَعَلۡتُهَآ إِذٗا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla faʿaltuhā idhan wa-anā mina al-ḍālīna
